com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner

Class AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<I,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractScannerPlugin<I,D>
      • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractResourceScannerPlugin<I,FileDescriptor>
        • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<I,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The container type.
    E - The element type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScannerPlugin<I,FileDescriptor>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDirectoryScannerPlugin, ZipFileScannerPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<I,E>
extends AbstractResourceScannerPlugin<I,FileDescriptor>
    Abstract base implementation for scanner plugins that handle containers of elements like directories, archives, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        public final FileDescriptor scan(I container,
                                 String path,
                                 Scope scope,
                                 Scanner scanner)
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ScannerPlugin
        Scan the item.
        Parameters:
        container - The item.
        path - The path where the item is located.
        scope - The scope.
        scanner - The scanner instance to delegate items this plugin resolves from the given item.
        Returns:
        The FileDescriptor instance representing the scanned item.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a problem occurs.

      • getContainerDescriptor

        protected abstract FileContainerDescriptor getContainerDescriptor(I container,
                                                                  ScannerContext scannerContext)
        Return the descriptor representing the artifact.
        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        scannerContext - The scanner context.
        Returns:
        The artifact descriptor.

      • getEntries

        protected abstract Iterable<? extends E> getEntries(I container)
                                             throws IOException
        Return an iterable which delivers the entries of the container.

        The entries must not contain the relative root element, i.e. "/".

        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        Returns:
        The iterable of entries.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the entries cannot be determined.

      • getRelativePath

        protected abstract String getRelativePath(I container,
                                          E entry)
        Return the relative path of an element within the container.

        The following conditions must be considered:

        • The separator to use is "/".
        • The path must start with "/".
        • The path must not end with "/".

        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        entry - The entry.
        Returns:
        The relative path.

      • createScope

        protected abstract Scope createScope(Scope currentScope)
        Create a scope depending on the container type, e.g. a JAR file should return classpath scope.
        Parameters:
        currentScope - The current scope.
        Returns:
        The scope.

      • getEntry

        protected abstract Resource getEntry(I container,
                                     E entry)
        Return a Resource representing an entry.
        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        entry - The entry.
        Returns:
        The FileResource .
